description: Make a double batch of 'fried' rice and turn it into these crispy, crunchy handheld fritters, well-suited to lunch boxes and afternoon tea.
name: Oven-Baked 'Fried' Rice Fritters Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5ml extra virgin olive oil cooking spray

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 210°C/200°C fan-forced. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper. Place rice mixture in a large bowl. Add egg and flour. Stir until well combined.

Using 1/4 cup of the mixture at a time, spoon mixture 10cm apart onto baking trays. Using damp hands, gently press mixture to form 8cm-wide fritters. Repeat with remaining mixture to make 10 fritters in total. Lightly spray with oil.
Bake for 10 minutes or until golden. Stand on trays for 2 minutes to cool slightly. To serve, dollop with yoghurt and sprinkle with chives.
